meanings.definition: Showing dedication and diligence in one's work or duties.
meanings.sent1: The sedulous student always completes assignments on time.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her sedulous work ethic in the office.
meanings.sent3: The sedulous squirrel diligently gathered nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her sedulous attention to detail was like a finely tuned machine.
meanings.sent5: The sedulous gardener carefully tended to each plant in the garden.

meanings.definition: Characterized by careful and persistent effort.
meanings.sent1: The sedulous worker never shies away from a challenging task.
meanings.sent2: His sedulous approach to problem-solving always yields results.
meanings.sent3: The sedulous detective meticulously examined every clue.
meanings.sent4: Her sedulous determination was a beacon of inspiration to others.
meanings.sent5: The sedulous artist spent hours perfecting every brushstroke.

meanings.sent1: The sedulous explorer never gave up on finding the lost city.
meanings.sent2: His sedulous efforts to learn a new language paid off.
meanings.sent3: The sedulous chef carefully crafted each dish with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her sedulous commitment to her goals was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The sedulous musician practiced tirelessly to master the piece.
